message:
Forced Labor is also a form of human trafficking. Anyone one with a vulnerability is at greater risk of being trafficked. In South Carolina a victim with intellectual disabilities was subjected to  "violence, threats, isolation and intimidation to work for over 100 hours a week without pay."
https://buff.ly/2LqyWG7
